name: Ponyvania: Order of Equestria
description:
Ponyvania: Order of Equestria is a 2D action-platformer fangame based on Castlevania and My Little Pony. It is a parody of Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia.

The game plays very similar to older Castlevania games but with some features of the newer games, such as equipment and leveling-up.
